response.original_title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
response.overview: Bridget Jones navigates life as a widow and single mum with the help of her family, friends, and former lover, Daniel. Back to work and on the apps, she's pursued by a younger man and maybe – just maybe – her son's science teacher.
response.tagline: She's starting a new chapter. Just as she is.
response.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
